articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: COVID-19: WHO renames deadly coronavirus
articles.description: Global health agency says name picked to avoid references to specific location, animal species or group of people.
articles.content:
The World Health Organization (WHO) has announced that "COVID-19" will now be the official name of the deadly virus from China, saying the disease represented a "very grave threat" for the world but there was a "realistic chance" of stopping it.
"We now have… [+2905 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: China says Taiwan drills are meant to hone combat capabilities
articles.description: Appearance of Chinese bombers, fighter jets has triggered anger in Taiwan, which scrambled its own fighter jets.
articles.content:
A second day of drills by China's military close to Taiwan were aimed at improving combat capabilities, the People's Liberation Army said after Taiwan's air force scrambled to intercept Chinese jets that briefly crossed into its airspace.
Tensions have spike… [+2128 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: China coronavirus outbreak: All the latest updates
articles.description: Country records biggest single day death toll in outbreak, which began in December in the central city of Wuhan.
articles.content:
The death toll in the coronavirus outbreak in China has now reached more than 1,000, after 108 people died from the virus on Monday, the highest daily toll since the outbreak began late last year.
The total number of deaths on the mainland was 1,016, the Nat… [+2829 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: What happens if you get infected by the new coronavirus?
articles.description: Here's what we know so far on what the coronavirus does to the human body in cases of infections and deaths.
articles.content: China said the death toll from the new coronavirus surged past 1,000 on Tuesday, as Beijing stepped up efforts to treat tens of thousands of sick people and the World Health Organization (WHO) urged the world to "fight this virus before it gets out of control… [+4648 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: China coronavirus death toll breaches 1,000
articles.description: Health authorities say the number of deaths on Monday was 108 - the highest since the outbreak began.
articles.content:
The death toll in the coronavirus outbreak in China breached 1,000 on February 10, after 108 people died from the virus, the highest daily toll since the outbreak began late last year.
